Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is highly valued by many of our customers. I believe it could be a valuable asset for you as well. For this unique opportunity, I'm offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $180. This includes not only the product itself but also exclusive access to our customer support and future updates. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the benefits of our product at an exceptional value. Let me know if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
